name: Mindbreak (JoestarJoao)
description:
Equipe Arautos:

- João Paulo Zanchetta de Carvalho Filho

- Gabryel Goulart Schürhaus

Mindbreak was the attempt to make a visual novel that breaks where the players drop the emotions of the character and build it back, but we couldn't make the game as we wanted so that's the final result of our participation on the 12º GAME JAM UNIVALI

Sound: https://freesound.org/people/josefpres/sounds/651543/
